item.title: Create Virtual Machine With vTPM in Ubuntu
item.description: Reference Paper Berger, S., Goldman, K., Pendarakis, D., Safford, D., Valdez, E. and Zohar, M., 2015, March. Scalable attestation: A step toward secure and trusted clouds. In 2015 IEEE International Conference on Cloud Engineering (pp. 185-194). IEEE. item.title: Display Git Branch Name in Bash
item.description: First å°†è„šæœ¬ä¸‹è½½åˆ° Home ç›®å½• $ git clone https://github.com/KipJiang/git-aware-prompt.git ~/git-aware-prompt $ mv ~/git-aware-prompt ~/.git-aware-prompt ä¿®æ”¹é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ .bashrc $ vim ~/.bashrc æ·»åŠ å¦‚ä¸‹å†…å®¹ # git branch function export PS1="\${debian_chroot:+(\$debian_chroot)}\[\033[01;32m\]\u@\h\[\033[00m\]:\[\033[01;34m\]\w\[\033[00m\] \[$txtcyn\]\$git_branch\[$txtred\]\$git_dirty\[$txtrst\]\$" export GITAWAREPROMPT=~/.git-aware-prompt source "${GITAWAREPROMPT}/main.sh" ä½¿é…ç½®ç”Ÿæ•ˆ $ source ~/.bashrc æ•ˆæœ Ubuntu CentOS Second ç¼–è¾‘ ~/.bashrcï¼Œæ·»åŠ å¦‚ä¸‹å†…å®¹ # git branch function function git_branch { branch="`git branch 2>/dev/null | grep "^\*" | sed -e "s/^\*\ //"`" if [ "${branch}" != "" ];then if [ "${branch}" = "(no branch)" ];then branch="(`git rev-parse --short HEAD`.
